subject: feat: add batch file output for AI review tracking
body:
- extract.js now creates batches/ folder with batch-NNN.json files (10 commits each)
- Playbook updated with batch file workflow:
  - reports/<repo>/batches/ = raw extracted batches
  - processed/<repo>/batches/ = approved batches with AI tags
  - Progress = compare file lists between folders
- Removes checkpoint.json in favor of batch file tracking
- Clear verification: can't skip or redo batches
